page.title: 11Day of a Housewife
page.content: MONDAY 7.30 am - gets up and has breakfast before she takes her eldest daughter to school. At 8.10 she clears the breakfast table and takes her other daughter to primary school and collects washing. 8.50 am - she gets back and cleans the house. 12.10 pm - gets lunch ready and her husband arrives home. When her husband goes back to work she goes shopping. At 3.20 she goes to collect her daughter from primary school. Then she does some gardening before she goes to collect her other daughter. 4.20 pm - After a rest she makes the dinner and at 5.30 her husband arrives home and the family has dinner.
